replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
C:\Users\Administrator\Desktop\HMCL\.minecraft\versions\1.15.2
打开版本核心.jar 右键用压缩包打开 删除里面的META-INF文件夹

replies.author: chun__yu
replies.txt_content:
